item.description:
Massachusetts Biomedical Research Day 2010
When: Thursday, October 21, 2010 from 11:30 a.m. to 1:30 p.m.
Where: State House, The Grand Staircase
Massachusetts Biomedical Research Day is the day to recognize the vast contributions of biomedical research and researchers to our knowledge, to our well-being, and to the improved quality of life for people around the world. Celebrate at the State House to honor four individuals who have made outstanding contributions, hear their thoughts on biomedical research, share an informal buffet luncheon. Full details will be published shortly.
item.name: Massachusetts Biomedical Research Day 2010
